feed.title: Dawarich Releases

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.21.4
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug where Photon API for patreon supporters was not being used for reverse geocoding.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, Arne Schwarck, derpderpington, Chippie, dint and jhalpern on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.21.3...0.21.4

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.21.5
entry.content:
You may now use Geoapify API for reverse geocoding. To obtain an API key, sign up at https://myprojects.geoapify.com/ and create a new project. Make sure you have read and understood the pricing policy and Terms and Conditions.

Added

  • Geoapify API support for reverse geocoding. Provide GEOAPIFY_API_KEY env var to use it.

Removed

  • Photon ENV vars from the .env.development and docker-compose.yml files.
  • APPLICATION_HOST env var.
  • REVERSE_GEOCODING_ENABLED env var.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, Arne Schwarck, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski and EurenikZ on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Implement support for Geoapify as reverse geocoding service by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/628

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.21.4...0.21.5

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.21.6
entry.content:
Changed

  • Disabled visit suggesting job after import.
  • Improved performance of the User#years_tracked method.

Fixed

  • Inconsistent password for the dawarich_db service in docker-compose_mounted_volumes.yml. #605
  • Points are now being rendered with higher z-index than polylines. #577
  • Run cache cleaning and preheating jobs only on server start. #594

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, Arne Schwarck, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, EurenikZ and Schlufo on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Various fixes #1 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/629

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.21.5...0.21.6

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.22.1
entry.content:
Removed

  • Gems caching volume from the docker-compose.yml file. #638

To update existing docker-compose.yml to new changes, refer to the following:

```diff dawarich_app: image: freikin/dawarich:latest ... volumes: - - dawarich_gem_cache_app:/usr/local/bundle/gems ... dawarich_sidekiq: image: freikin/dawarich:latest ... volumes: - - dawarich_gem_cache_app:/usr/local/bundle/gems ...

volumes: dawarich_db_data: - dawarich_gem_cache_app: - dawarich_gem_cache_sidekiq: dawarich_shared: dawarich_public: dawarich_watched: ```

Changed

  • GET /api/v1/health endpoint now returns a X-Dawarich-Response: Hey, Im alive and authenticated! header if user is authenticated.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, Arne Schwarck, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, EurenikZ and Schlufo on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Remove unused volumes from docker-compose.yml by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/643

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.22.0...0.22.1

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.22.2
entry.content:
âœ¨ The Fancy Routes release âœ¨

Added

  • In the Map Settings (the screw nut in the top left corner of the map), you can now enable/disable the Fancy Routes feature. Simply said, it will color your routes based on the speed of each segment.
  • Hovering over a polyline now shows the speed of the segment. Move cursor over a polyline to see the speed of different segments.
  • Distance and points number in the custom control to the map.

Changed

  • The name of the "Polylines" feature is now "Routes".

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, Arne Schwarck, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski and Schlufo on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 3.1.0 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/662
  • Bump super_diff from 0.14.0 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/661
  • Feature/fancy polylines by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/654

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.22.1...0.22.2
